lead_paragraph: TAUBER--Dr. Robert, a dentist retired from private practice, died Thursday, March 17. Dr. Tauber was very active in the dental community, serving as an Assistant Clinical Professor of Dentistry at Columbia University and terms as President of the Ninth District and Chairman of New York State Dental Association Council on Ethics. He is survived by his wife, Dorothy, his daughters, Sharon (Jeff) and Robin (Ted), and his grandchildren, Jason, Rachel, Max and Evelyn. His sense of humor defined his personality and his stories will be remembered with love and told for generations to come. Private interment to be held on Sunday. Donations in his memory may be made to Columbia University College of Dental Medicine. 1/3
